showToast.imgInvalidFileType: Invalid file type. Please select an image file (jpg, jpeg, png, gif, or webp)
showToast.emojiNotAllowed: Please avoid using emojis in this field.

content.auth: To use the full version of this app, place allow us to access some of your account info

register.step0Desc: Please enter a 6 characters referral code to continue
register.step2Title: Welcome to Looking! Choose your gender
register.step2Desc: Specify your gender to better personalize your interactions
register.step3Desc: Specify your age to better personalize your interactions
register.step4Desc: Other users will refer to you by this name
register.step5Desc: Upload your recent pic as your avatar

showToast.signUpSuccess: Sign up Success, please sign in

order.signIn: Check your orders after sign in

order>orderDetail.refunded: The cost of your order has been refunded
order>orderDetail.selectedBeforeCountdown: Please select a candidate before the countdown is over
order>orderDetail.orderCanceledByTimeoutExplanation: The order has been closed due to the fact that no one has taken the order within half an hour of its release (or you manually close it within this duration)
order>orderDetail.orderCanceledByTimeoutWithinSelection: Failure in selecting candidate in designated time. This order has been closed
order>orderDetail.serviceInProgress: Your service is now in progress
order>orderDetail.reviewRequest: Please provide provide some information about the client.
order>orderDetail.behavioralRecordPlaceholder: Please tell us more about the client's behavioral details throughout the service.

selectServantModal.title: Confirm your selection
selectServantModal.content1: Are you sure you want to choose

noCandidateCancelModal.title: Cancel Order
noCandidateCancelModal.content: Are you sure you want to cancel this order?

hasCandidateCancelModal.title: Cancel Order
hasCandidateCancelModal.content: Are you sure you want to cancel this order that has been selected by users? This order can only be refunded 80% of the pricing after exceeding today's free quota cancelling after somebody requested a quoted price. Your free quota today:

repostModal.title: Repost Order
repostModal.content: Are you sure you want repost this order?

completeOrderModal.title: Complete Order Advance
completeOrderModal.content: Are you certain you wish to proceed with completing this order ahead of the designated schedule?

showToast.fillReview: Please select a rating before submitting.
showToast.reviewed: You have reviewed this order already

order>orderDetail>emergencyCenter.title: Security Center
order>orderDetail>emergencyCenter.description: Feature to help you feel safe and secure while using our services.
order>orderDetail>emergencyCenter.letFriendTrack: Let your friend track your services

chat.signIn: Access chat feature after sign in

profile.authRequest: Please complete the real-name verification to secure your account in compliance with national regulations.

appWidget.title: Verified!🎉
appWidget.content: Your account has been successfully verified.

lCardBalanceTipsModal.title: Looking Card Balance
lCardBalanceTipsModal.content: The balance of the Looking card can be used to place orders and purchase Looking coins.

lCoinTipsModal.title: Looking Coins
lCoinTipsModal.content: Engage in effective conversations with users and earn Looking Coins as a reward. These coins can be withdrawn to your balance.

profile>balance>withdraw.tips: Third-party platforms such as WeChat and banks are charging service fee (0.6%). We will charge you for these additional fee (minimum of ¥5) in this case. Appreciate for your understanding.

profile>balance>withdraw>addPaymentAccou.tipsAilpay: Connect Alipay to start withdrawing your balance instantly
profile>balance>withdraw>addPaymentAccou.tipsBankCard: Link a bank card to enable quick and easy withdrawals

showToast.matchFailed: Verification failed. Please confirm if your real name, recorded ID number, and the bank card you entered match
showToast.invalidCard: Your card is invalid. Please contact us
showToast.inputError: Input error, please double check the correctness of the data submitted.

profile>realNameAuthentication.tips: You account profile (i.e: your gender, age etc) will be updated based on the info provides by your ID card information

showToast.matchFailed: Provided name and ID number doesn't matched
showToast.noRecord: We couldn't find your personal info, please contact us.
showToast.inputError: Input error, please double check your name and ID card number

insufficientTimeModal.title: Awaiting a Gift to Start Chatting
insufficientTimeModal.content: You’re unable to send a message until the user sends a gift. Once a gift is received, you’ll be able to respond and chat with the user for a limited time, depending on the gift type.

showToast.cannotSendMsg: You cannot send the message to a client belongs a closed order, unless they sent messages to you

component>balance>withdraw.hint: You can only perform this operation during weekdays, and only once each day

showToast.weekendError: Withdrawals are not allowed on Saturdays and Sundays
showToast.oneWithdrawPerDay: You can only withdraw once per day
showToast.invalidAmount: Please enter a valid withdrawal amount

component>balance>referralQRCode.descA: If a user opens this mini program by scanning your QR code, you will receive 5% of their order price stored in your balance each time they successfully complete an order.
component>balance>referralQRCode.descB: This also applies if you share this mini program with users after signing in.

component>order>increasedQuotedPriceRequ.tips: The range of the quoted price will be lager equal than initial order price and smaller equal than 2 times of the initial order price
component>order>increasedQuotedPriceRequ.updateQuotedPriceTips: You can only update your quoted price Once
